ing.item: (16 oz) cranberry sauce (either jellied or whole berry)
Bottle (8 oz) french garlic dressing (I've also used Russian or Italian dressing, or even low or no fat)
Chicken (I use 4-5 boneless skinless breasts, Sams or Price Club variety)

directions.step:
Mix together and bake at 350 degrees for 1 1/2 hours.
I cook rice with this dish (separately) and spoon sauce on the rice.
Posted to EAT-L Digest 23 November 96
